    ff1 = lambda k, q: 1
    ff2 = lambda k, q: 0.9 * np.sin(q) * (np.sin(k) + np.sin((k + q)))
    ff3 = lambda k, q: 0
    ff4 = lambda k, q: 0
    potential_function = lambda q, N: 1 / (1 + q * q) / (2 * N)
